title: Strengthening CS Competency in Practical Skills: Student Progress Prediction Modeling Based on Learning Spaces

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can preprocess location and interaction data collected from learning spaces to extract over 14 socio-spatial features
Learners can design student-specific academic progress prediction models using machine learning classifiers and achieve over 80% accuracy
Based on predictive results, strategies can be established to identify low-performing students early and applied in actual educational environments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
